title: ATIR-BCN
subtitle: Internship as Fashion Designer
description:
I completed a fashion design internship with the Spanish brand Atir BCN, where I actively contributed to the conceptualization, preparation, and design of their summer capsule collection. My responsibilities during this internship encompassed a range of essential tasks:

- Conceptualization and Reference Searching: I actively participated in brainstorming sessions and conducted research to contribute to the conceptual development of the collection.

- Design Collection Pieces: I was involved in the actual design process, where I contributed to the creation of various pieces within the collection.

- Fabrics Project Consult: I provided input and assistance in the selection and coordination of fabrics for the collection, ensuring they aligned with the overall design vision.

- Contact with Atelier and Suppliers: I established and maintained communication with the atelier and suppliers, facilitating the production process and ensuring that the design requirements were met.
